name: BMM_OPERATOR
documentation: Definition of a symbolic operator associated with a function.

position.name: position
position.documentation: Position of operator in syntactic representation.

symbols.name: symbols
symbols.documentation: Set of `String` symbols that may be used to represent this operator in a textual representation of a BMM model.

name.name: name
name.documentation: Formal name of the operator, e.g. 'minus' etc.
